author: Alexandra Genova and Naomi Larsson
title: Life under lockdown: Coronavirus sparks fears for UK prisons
description: Social distancing often means solitary confinement as the virus takes hold, while guards are calling for early releases.
content: London, United Kingdom - Prisoners across England and Wales are being confined to their cells for almost 24 hours a day, with some doubled-up in cells built for one person, as institutions try to halt the spread of coronavirus. For those behind bars, the real… [+7131 chars]
